meanings.definition: The quality or state of being visual.
meanings.sent1: The visualities of the painting were truly captivating.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the visualities of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The visualities of the magic show left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: His dream was filled with colorful visualities.
meanings.sent5: The visualities of the fireworks display were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The visual aspects or characteristics of something.
meanings.sent1: The visualities of the landscape were stunning.
meanings.sent2: He studied the visualities of the ancient ruins.
meanings.sent3: The visualities of the fashion show were a feast for the eyes.
meanings.sent4: The visualities of the city at night were like a painting.
meanings.sent5: The visualities of the flower garden were vibrant and beautiful.
